title: Blended Weblog-Based Microlearning Program for Enhancing Academic Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic academic writing structures and experience in workplace report writing
context.additional_context: Customized learning environment for enterprise managers/leaders to improve business report and policy document writing skills.

learning_goals: Learners can write business reports of 500+ characters using academic writing structures (introduction-body-conclusion).
Learners can improve the logical coherence of web-posted articles by over 80% through a peer feedback system.
Learners can post and collaborate on academic articles on web logs three or more times weekly in mobile environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
